)

Sets a single position.

Use it unless you want to mess with bit operations.

Parameters:
slot Position to be set.
cubie Cubie on this position.
orient Orientation of the cube.
See also:
Explorer::Mask

void Explorer::Cube::strip (  ) 

Prints single bits of a state to the standard output.

Bits are printed in little endian format (i.e. the least important bit comes first).
